definition: a card game similar to whist, take a siesta
details:
noun
- a card game similar to whist
- sleeping for a short period of time
= example: sleeping for a short period of time
= synonyms: catnap, cat sleep, forty winks, short sleep, snooze
- the yarn (as in a rug or velvet or corduroy) that stands up from the weave
= synonyms: pile
- a soft or fuzzy surface texture
- a period of time spent sleeping
= synonyms: sleep
verb
- take a siesta
= example: take a siesta
= synonyms: catnap, catch a wink
